msg.data:
HADOOP_CONF_DIR=/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/etc/hadoop
HADOOP_HOME=/usr/hadoop-2.7.3
HADOOP_VERSION=2.7.3
SPARK_DIST_CLASSPATH=/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/etc/hadoop/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/common/lib/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/common/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/hdfs/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/hdfs/lib/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/hdfs/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/yarn/lib/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/yarn/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/mapreduce/lib/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/mapreduce/*:/usr/hadoop-2.7.3/share/hadoop/tools/lib/*
SPARK_DRIVER_MEMORY=512m
SPARK_EXECUTOR_MEMORY=512m
SPARK_HOME=/usr/spark-2.2.0
SPARK_MASTER=spark://master:7077
SPARK_PACKAGE=spark-2.2.0-bin-without-hadoop
SPARK_VERSION=2.2.0
SPARK_WORKER_CORES=1
SPARK_WORKER_MEMORY=2G
ZEPPELIN_COMMIT=v0.7.3
ZEPPELIN_CONF_DIR=/usr/zeppelin/conf
ZEPPELIN_ENCODING=UTF-8
ZEPPELIN_HOME=/usr/zeppelin
ZEPPELIN_IDENT_STRING=
ZEPPELIN_INTERPRETER_REMOTE_RUNNER=bin/interpreter.sh
ZEPPELIN_INTP_MEM=-Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m
ZEPPELIN_LOG_DIR=/usr/zeppelin/logs
ZEPPELIN_MEM=-Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m
ZEPPELIN_NOTEBOOK_DIR=/usr/zeppelin/notebook
ZEPPELIN_PID_DIR=/usr/zeppelin/run
ZEPPELIN_PORT=80
ZEPPELIN_RUNNER=/usr/jdk1.8.0_131/bin/java
ZEPPELIN_WAR=/usr/zeppelin/zeppelin-web-0.7.3.war
